descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
"Ready to become the ultimate champion? Dive into Monster Arena 2, the thrilling VR monster battling game for the Meta Quest 3! This is more than just arena combat; it's a true single-player action RPG  Some are dancing , some are hopping, some are running and some are shooting.


Monster Arena 2 is a sequel of the recently released monster arena vr on meta.
This is a game comprising of 10 levels.
The features of this game are as follows:-

1. Single Player
2. Variety of enemies with different color options.
3. Choose any of the 10 levels and proceed to the next after you survive the current level for 4 minutes
4. Experience new world of monsters and creatures all in one arena to battle against each other face to face. 
5. Composed of both light and dark environments.
6. create a high score in mini open arena game
7. shoot monsters before they attack you.

The monsters in this game do not shoot bullets instead they shoot another alien which in turn attacks and hence dodge the aliens and take down all the enemies 
It is mini open world game with 10 different arenas (levels).
if you succeed you will also encounter the boss levels in between .

Shoot the monsters and creatures around you and create a high score. Experience the new vr game like never before. You will progress to a different level upon surviving in the first for four minutes.

If you're looking for an action-packed VR with a focus on skill-based arena combat and building the perfect team, download monster arena
